error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\elasticsearch_connector_autocomp\EventSubscriber\DefaultSubscriber::elasticsearchConnectorPrepareIndexMapping() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

Parameter $event of method Drupal\elasticsearch_connector_autocomp\EventSubscriber\DefaultSubscriber::elasticsearchConnectorPrepareIndex() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to designate that the extension is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
